results.title: Kensal House
results.creator_credit: Frank Sainsbury and Gas Light and Coke Company
results.brief_description: Kensal House was built by the Gas Light and Coke Company to replace slums in Kensal Green. The aim was to show that under reasonable conditions, an adequate supply of gas fuel costs no more than an inadequate supply of less efficient fuel. Conditions in the slums are shown. Then the design of the flats is explained, and its clubs, nursery school and gardens shown. The operation of Kensal House as a community is stressed.

results.title: Kelly
results.creator_credit: Alistair Matheson, Heritage Films and Impala Films
results.brief_description: The story of the life and times of Captain James Kelly 1791-1851, who became an apprentice sailor at the age of thirteen in Sydney and who later became known as the father of Australian whaling. Kelly settled in Tasmania where he married and raised a family, prospered financially, but died at the age of sixty after experiencing financial ruin.

results.title: Keeping ourselves safe
results.brief_description: Seven short dramatized vignettes on the subject of adults and older youths attempting to make sexual advances to children: “Fathers friend”, “The Photos”, “The Baby sitter”, “Jane and her uncle”, “The Swimming baths”, “Amanda and her father” and “On the bus”.

results.title: Keepers of the mystery
results.brief_description: A Poetic travellogue of Scotland, documenting the distillation process of whisky on an industrial level, including barrel construction, blending, tasting (malt whisky and grain whiskey), Packaging and distribution. The film ends with a charming animated commercial for Whitehorse Cellar Scotch Whisky.

results.title: Keep clean, eyes open: your responsibility
results.creator_credit: Terence Weathers and J Lyons and Co
results.brief_description: A key to cleanliness film which deals with food poisoning in the home, in a shop, in a restaurant or in a factory. The film explains poisoning - concentrating on germs and makes some suggestions for prevention of contamination.

results.title: Keep 'em in the fairway
results.brief_description: Highlights the five golf fundamentals which the Professional Golfers’ Association (PGA) believes essential to every good golf swing. Features golfers Bobby Jones, Sam Snead, Ben Hogan and others.

results.title: Kaziranga: main stronghold of the Indian rhino
results.brief_description: The Kaziranga Game Reserve in Assam India. Shows elephants working and wild but concentrates on the endangered Indian rhinoceros including the capture of a young Indian rhinoceros for transportation to a zoo. Commentary by Frank Phillips.

results.title: Kangaroo creek gang: ...`do the right thing'
results.creator_credit: David Kefford, Terry Watt and Kangaroo Creek Gang
results.brief_description: An animated video which encourages primary school children to “Do the right thing’ when disposing of rubbish. Encourages children to place rubbish in bins and to sort for recycling. This video is part of a kit which includes an audiotape with songs and advice to teachers.
